title: Self-Monitoring Task-Based Education for Improving Korean Pronunciation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate Korean Grammar and Vocabulary Proficiency, Awareness of Basic Pronunciation Rules
context.additional_context: Conducted in limited-technology environments (primarily smartphones), may include blended learning elements

learning_goals: Learners can apply Korean consonant assimilation/nasalization rules within words and sentences with 80% accuracy
Learners can perform self-pronunciation diagnosis and correction using voice recording and playback features
Learners can use pronunciation reflecting consonant assimilation/nasalization rules in daily conversations with ≥70% frequency

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
